name: The Da Vinci Code | Sokoban
description:
______________________________________________

Professor Robert Langdon mysteriously winds up unconscious
inside the catacombs. Help him find clues in order to recall what happened.
Find the exit by pushing boxes in this Sokoban game.

______________________________________________

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement
R - Restart Room

______________________________________________

Made in ~7 days for our

HUMANITIES 10 - FILM STUDY

MSHS 21-22
